definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Understanding the contributions and weaknesses of different Feminisms.
sentences.chinese: 了解各种女性主义的贡献与缺点。
苏格拉底是女性主义吗？

sentences.english: Feministic criticism also appears in the later years of last century.
sentences.chinese: 上世纪后期也有人通过女性主义对其作品进行解读。

sentences.english: Finally, I'll write about the turning to Post-modem Feminism.
sentences.chinese: 最后，论述女性主义后现代转向的必然趋势。

sentences.english: Sarah is often interpreted in the perspectives of Post-modernism and Feminism.
sentences.chinese: 研究者普遍从后现代主义和女性主义解读萨拉的形象。

sentences.english: In the Peony Pavilion " is a legendary drama with feminist tendency."
sentences.chinese: 名著《牡丹亭》是一部有着女性主义倾向的传奇作品。

sentences.english: Feminist movement has gone through two climaxes.
sentences.chinese: 女性主义的发展经历了两大高潮。

sentences.english: This point is reasserted in Part 3, the development of Woolf's feminist thought.
sentences.chinese: 第三章讲述伍尔夫女性主义思想的发展。

sentences.english: Therefore, Kant's philosophy is incompatible with ecofeminism.
sentences.chinese: 因此，康德哲学与生态女性主义是不相容的。

sentences.english: There are mutual influence and interactive relationship between Deconstructive theory and Feminism.
sentences.chinese: 解构理论与女性主义之间存在影响与互动的关系。

sentences.english: Li Ang's are the cream of Taiwan's feminist literary works.
sentences.chinese: 李昂的作品是台湾女性主义文学中的一朵奇葩。

sentences.english: This thesis attempts to analyze the critical history of Hamlet from the feminist perspective.
sentences.chinese: 本文试从女性主义的视角对哈评史进行分析研究。

sentences.english: Coincidentally the topic about woman and nature is in accordance with ecofeminists concerns.
sentences.chinese: 女性和自然恰巧也是生态女性主义的所关注的主题。

sentences.english: The third part discusses the conceiving of Irigaray's female discourse.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分，论述伊利格瑞女性主义话语理论的构想。

sentences.english: There exists the blind spots in western modem feminist criticisms.
sentences.chinese: 现代西方女性主义批评存在着盲点。

sentences.english: Autobiography is one of the important part of feminist poetics .
sentences.chinese: 自传体小说是女性主义诗学的重要组成部分。

pinyin: duo1 yuan2 wen2 hua4 zhu3 yi4
